title: Oh no! Page not found (404 error)
author: clicking "Subscribe," you agree to The Poetry Foundation's collection and use of your personal information submitted through this form in accordance with ourTerms of ServiceandPrivacy Policy, which may include use with our online advertising programs.
poem:
Error is boundless.Nor hope nor doubt,Though both be groundless,Will average out.

We're sorry, but we can’t find the page you’re looking for. It may have been moved or the address misspelled.
